entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kentville AAFC 7:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 53 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -10.8°C

Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain or snow. High 11.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets changing to rain in the morning and ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 February 2023
